name: .AVASTLIC
summary: Learn about .AVASTLIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an AVASTLIC file with Avast Pro Antivirus and Avast Internet Security. If you have installed the software, you can double-click the file to open it, too.
You can also open an AVASTLIC file by clicking the "Insert license file" button in the program's "Subscription" window, or supply the license file during the software installation process.
